name: LDR
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I need you more than ever, but you're far away
I don't know if I can stand to stand without you again
So light a candle, grab your webcam
Let's watch the sunset virtually
I'd say it's not too deep, but I'd be lyin' through my teeth
I just wanna know
[Chorus]
Why does loving you have to be so hard?
I'm stuck holding my heart in stasis, suspend 
LDR
Zodiac's a myth, but spite my reach goes far
My life is magnifying the light of my LDR
[Bridge]
LDR, LDR
LDR, L - D - R
LDR, LDR
LDR, L - D - R
[Verse 2]
LDR
It's not that hard
True love can be
So very far
My eyes can't see
They're blind to me
Without the light
I only feel the night
[Verse 3]
Astroprojection
Doc says I'm infected
160 BPM
 
mon c≈ìur
Bat pour toi en ce moment
[Verse 4]
Hey, don't you wanna be my hookup?
Then won't you just look up to the skies
When the clock ticks on right past three
Open up your phone and just search for me
In spite of all this newfound clarity
[Chorus]
Why does loving you have to be so hard?
I'm stuck holding my heart in stasis, suspend LDR
Zodiac's a myth, but spite my reach goes far
My life is magnifying the light of my LDR
[Chorus]
Why does loving you have to be so hard?
I'm stuck holding my heart in stasis, suspend LDR
Zodiac's a myth, but spite my reach goes far
My life is magnifying the light of my LDR
